extendedInfo.description: TrueNotes is a color notepad app with a difference. The app offers awesome and unique features (such as voice recognition and the ability to customize the notepad colors) aimed at making notes taking while on-the-go a simple, pleasant and delightful experience for users. The primary focus is on simplicity and ease-of-use.  Key features includes:- Add notes via Voice or Typing. Add as many note entries as you want.- Ability to Customize the Notepad colors on-the-fly. Users can set the notepad background, text and border colors.- Unique Lined Note Editor/View screen - just like paper ruled yellow notepad. - Edit, View and Delete note entries on the fly.- Email notes to anyone directly from the Note Editor screen.- Startup screen showing a list of all note entries.- Fast Searching and Filtering of notes by keywords in the title or details.- Easy navigation (previous/next) of notes on the Note Editor screen.- All note entries are securely stored on your local device.Lots of cool Additional Features coming soon.So, download and start using TrueNotes Notepad app today !!Tags: notes, notepad, truenotes, yellow ruled notepad, color notepad, notes taking, document, writing, tablet notes. Follow me on twitter: http://www.twitter.com/davpow

reviews.title: Great Color Notepad app
reviews.comment: Great color Notepad app. Very Easy to use and I\'m able to change the notepad color scheme to whatever I want. I use it for all my notes taking.
reviews.author: David Powell
